description: Installation of catégorie 3 furniture in Longueuil, QC
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Call for Bids on Category 3 Office Furniture
#### Expired Tender
 * **Procurement Reference Number**: WS3764341560
 * **Solicitation Number**: WS3764341560
 * **Publication Date**: December 22, 2022
 * **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
 * **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
 * **Procurement Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
 * **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
 * **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
 * **Regions of Opportunity**: None
 * **Regions of Delivery**: Longueuil, Québec, Canada
 * **End User Entities**: Shared Services Canada (SSC)
 * **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
 * **Contact Information**:
   * **Name**: Julien, Lisa-Marie
   * **Email**: `lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`
   * **Phone**: Not available for contact
 * **Description**: 
 There is a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued by Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Shared Services Canada, for the procurement of category 3 office furniture under the Furniture Supply Arrangement (FSA) E60PQ-140003. The furniture will be delivered and installed in Longueuil, Québec, Canada. Interested bidders must submit their bids, along with all required supporting documentation, by January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST to be considered for this contract. All bids submitted after this deadline will be marked as non-responsive.
 * **Additional Information**: 
 The specifications and bid requirements can be accessed through the contact information above. The contact is also there to provide further details on this bid.\\
No further discussion is possible with the contract holder.

Since this is an expired tender, do not attempt to submit a bid. You should have been aware of the dates provided and should have been in contact with this contactor prior to the deadline to discuss any issues you had regarding the details of the tender. Our role here is to inform you of the expire and close date and to remind you that no bids will be answered anymore. You can input this in your records to avoid bothering with late submissions in the future.
